job_description:
NET Experience 10+ years of experience with programming and developing in .NET Core. Experience with coding and implementing applications using, C#, .Net, VB.NET, ASP. Net, MVC, Identity C #, JavaScript, jQuery and XML/XLST Experience with Windows Server, Microsoft SQL environment
NET Applications Experience building applications using MS .NET elements such as Windows Communication Foundation, Windows Presentation Framework, MS Sync Framework, Web Client Software Factory, MS Web Services and Entity Framework Experience with Visual Studio, Team Foundation Server, Dev Ops, DevExpress, Cloud development and Enterprise Library

Web Services and Web API

Experience in Service oriented architecture, object-oriented design, user interface development.

Design, develop and consume Web Services and Web API

Working with Use Cases, Class diagrams, component diagrams, state diagram etc.

Experience with Data Migration.

Strong communication skills and team player.

SQL Experience

Experience coding and implementing SQL procedures, scripts, T-SQL and Object definitions for SQL Server

Experience with Oracle RDMS and Web Servers

Experience with relational and hierarchical database technologies

Experience in the use of information retrieval packages using SQL (Stored procedures, triggers, functions)

Experience with one or more communications protocols

Experience with middleware and gateways

Desirable experience in application development in forensic sciences or related areas.

Must Haves

10+ years of experience with extensive knowledge of programming and developing in .NET Core
Extensive .NET development skills including VB.Net and C#, SQL database design and skills
Experience with coding and implementing applications using, C#, .Net, VB.NET, ASP. Net, MVC, Identity C #, JavaScript, jQuery and XML/XLST
Experience working in a team environment with TFS/DevOps experience.
